dashboard.title: Hello, {name}
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome back to your personal area

transactions.title: your Transactions
transactions.empty: There are no transactions at the moment.

recharge and withdraw.title: Recharge and Withdraw
recharge and withdraw.operation_time_1: The operation may require <bold>24-48 working hours</bold> before being processed.
recharge and withdraw.operation_time_2: Both the operations may require <bold>24-48 working hours</bold> before being processed.
recharge and withdraw.warning_message_2: • the transfer must come from the account owner
recharge and withdraw.pending-verification: The IBAN Certification is under verification.
recharge and withdraw.failed-verification: The IBAN Certification has failed the verification, try again.
recharge and withdraw.wallet_warning_profile: Profile not completed. Please finish the <bold>registration</bold>.
recharge and withdraw.wallet_warning_documents: Awaiting documents validation for account verification. Check <bold>Documents</bold> section.

promotions.title: your Promotions
promotions.sharing_code_desc_active: Invite a friend to Recrowd using the code shown, you will both receive <bold>€{amount} as a gift</bold>* upon full registration/investment.
promotions.sharing_code_desc_not_active: There are currently no active promotions on your account, but more will be coming soon!

aml.title: Anti money laundering
aml.high_risk_sector: Is yours an high risk sector?
aml.personal_political_position: I confirm I have never held a public office
aml.family_political_position: I confirm none of my family members ever held a public office
aml.confirm_investment_holder: I confirm I will be the owner of my investments

personal data.title: Personal Data
personal data.name: Business Name*
personal data.mandatory_data: ** Mandatory data in case of registration as an investor

privacy and security.title: Privacy and Security
privacy and security.auth_2fa_not_active_descr: Enable it to protect your profile information, you will receive a <bold>code</bold> to the <bold>e-mail</bold> address you indicated.
privacy and security.auth_2fa_active_descr: You will receive a <bold>code</bold> to the <bold>e-mail</bold> address indicated by you to proceed with the actions on your profile.
privacy and security.auth_2fa_active_assistance: To disable the Two-factor Authentication, contact the <link>client support</link>.
privacy and security.auth_2fa_confirm_descr_1: Open your 2-factor authentication app and scan the QR code below
privacy and security.auth_2fa_confirm_descr_2: After that confirm the token from the app

documents and iban.title: your Documents
documents and iban.i_have_a_joint: I have a joint bank account

consent and privacy.title: Consent and Privacy
consent and privacy.conditions_consentTandC: Ho preso visione dell'Informativa sul trattamento dei dati personali
consent and privacy.conditions_privacyLemonway: Presto il consenso all’invio di newsletter
consent and privacy.conditions_TCLemonway: Presto il consenso all’invio di comunicazioni commerciali sui servizi offerti dalla piattaforma
consent and privacy.conditions_TCInvestors: Ho preso visione delle condizioni generali per l'investitore

notifications.title: Notifications and Updates
notifications.empty_0: There are no unread notifications at the moment.
notifications.empty_1: There are no read notifications at the moment.
notifications.empty_2: There are no notifications at the moment.

success.title: Operation done!
success.description: The operation may take from 24-48 business hours to be processed. Otherwise contact support.

warning.title: Operation cancelled!
warning.description: The operation was canceled by the bank's platform. Return to the dashboard or try the operation again.

error.title: Oops!
error.description: Something went wrong on the bank's platform. Return to the dashboard or try the operation again.
